feed.title: Kinto Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Kinto: 21.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Breaking Changes

  • Prometheus metrics design was changed by @leplatrem in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3528
  • No more view count (use request_summary instead)
  • Endpoint is now the route name instead of the URL
  • Metrics names are now fixed and all variables are now labels
  • Use Prometheus histograms for timers (instead of Summary) by @leplatrem in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3529

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/compare/20.6.1...21.0.0

entry.title: New release for Kinto: 21.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

New Features

  • Add config hash/path/datetime to root URL by @leplatrem in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3530
  • Add new settings to control Prometheus metrics by @leplatrem in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3533

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/compare/21.0.0...21.1.0

entry.title: New release for Kinto: 21.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Prevent random values to become metrics labels values by @leplatrem in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3534

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/compare/21.1.0...21.1.1

entry.title: New release for Kinto: 22.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Breaking Changes

  • Use explicit seconds suffix for duration metrics by @leplatrem in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3539
  • Remove redundant setting introduced in 3c3af9f by @leplatrem in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3535

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/compare/21.1.1...22.0.0

entry.title: New release for Kinto: 23.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Breaking Changes

  • Remove status from request_size and request_duration_seconds labels by @leplatrem in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3541
  • Downsize the Prometheus histograms to 8 buckets (https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3544)

Bug Fixes

  • Improve Makefile to avoid reinstall on each run by @leplatrem in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3545
  • Fixing duplicated prometheus metrics. Resolves remote-settings #872 by @alexcottner in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3546 and https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3542

New Features

  • Fixes #3533: Add ability to disable certain default metrics and adjust buckets by @leplatrem in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3544

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/compare/22.0.0...23.0.0
